nodes.text: The ANx-y/2 sensor cluster was a sensor package designed by Fabritech. The system was installed in the standard model of the Starfeld Industries Z-10 Seeker.

It was almost identical to the sensor package found on the Incom T-65 X-wing, but lacked the lateral scanning arrays. This distinction reduced the detection range of the ANx-y/2 system but granted superior visibility for smaller ships like the Z-10 Seeker.
The detection modes of the ANx-y/2 system include dedicated energy receptors, Full-spectrum transceivers, and life form indicators.
